metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support multiple document types, including PDFs, DOCX, PPTX, TXT, and RTF files . The capabilities improve comprehension and save time across various document types .

This FAQ addresses Adobe’s content usage and handling practices specific to improving generative AI capabilities in Acrobat and Adobe Acrobat Reader . The technology is still evolving and not perfect, not all ipientanswers are helpful or accurate . We will continue to  harness the power of this new technology responsibly .

Content is stored for 30 days in an encrypted, siloed, Adobe-controlled environment  with strict access controls . Content is only retained for . purposes that do not include training a Large Language Model (“LLM”) Examples of product improvement include improving the operability of generative AI in Acrobat .

AI Assistant is also available on phones through Acrobat mobile apps (iOS and Android) It isn't available on iPad or Android tablets . Generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader are turned on by default .

Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support XML data signatures that are used to sign data in XML forms . XML digital signatures ensure integrity, authentication, and non-repudiation in documents . XML signatures only have two data verification states, valid and invalid . The invalid state is called when a user alters the XML-signed content .
